variables.value: {{if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "ceo") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "founder") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "owner"); 40; if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "cto") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "cfo") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "vp") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "head"); 30; if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "manager") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "lead"); 20; if(contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "executive") | contains(lower(14.`Job title`); "analyst"); 10; 5))))}}
